name: Pitch reference
description: Generates a sine wave reference tone at a specified pitch or frequency.

parameters.name: Pitch mode
parameters.description: Sets the mode for specifying the reference tone.

parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: Sets the note pitch (MIDI note number) if Pitch mode is 'Pitch'. Respects global tuning.

parameters.name: Frequency
parameters.description: Sets the frequency if Pitch mode is 'Frequency'.

parameters.name: Amplitude
parameters.description: The amplitude of the signal (before gain is applied).

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: The level of the output signal.
